Text.Page:
Our most recent intelligence reveals other alliances are infiltrating our territory. I'll need you to patrol the Aurum encroachment area and the barrens.

You should also hunt the {@linkcreature:121#202#Aurum mugatos} and {@linkcreature:121#205#badlands ghilliedhus}.

We're an alliance and we're in this together! If level 65 members help lower level alliance members in this task, I'll toss in the bonus reward!

Thank you, !

More noctenium for us! The Free Trade Collective is on its way to the top!
